properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.aws.s3.bucket-name
properties.description: S3 bucket name.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.aws.s3.region-name
properties.description: Region name.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.aws.s3.test-on-startup
properties.description: Whether to do a test read/write on S3 on startup.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.aws.ses.region-name
properties.description: Region name.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.aws.ses.test-on-startup
properties.description: Whether to test connection on startup.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.base.backend-url
properties.description: The backend base URL.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.base.cors-allowed-origins
properties.description: Allowed CORS origins.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.base.default-user-locale
properties.description: The BCP 47 language tag (e.g. en-US) for the default locale to use when the user doesn't not specify one in the locale cookie.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.base.default-user-time-zone
properties.description: The default time zone ID to use when the user doesn't not specify one in the locale cookie.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.base.directory
properties.description: The directory to store all files. Must start with `file:` and end with a `/`.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.base.exit-after-startup
properties.description: When set to true the application will exit after startup.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.base.frontend-url
properties.description: The frontend base URL.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.base.locale-cookie-max-age
properties.description: The max-age of the locale cookie (default is 2^31 - 1 = 2147483647 = 2038-01-19 04:14:07).

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.base.locale-cookie-name
properties.description: The name of the locale cookie.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.base.populate-test-data
properties.description: Whether to create test data on startup.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.base.scheduled.watchdog-cron
properties.description: A cron string that determines when to run watchdog services.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.document.extra-image-sizes
properties.description: Map of suffices to sizes for extra images size to generate.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.document.max-image-size
properties.description: The maximum size in pixels for uploaded images in either dimension.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.logback.mail.enabled
properties.description: Enable sending mails via logback.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.logback.mail.enforce
properties.description: A comma-separated list of loggers to send mails for log statements of any level.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.logback.mail.from-address
properties.description: The sender mail address to use for logback mails.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.logback.mail.ignore
properties.description: A comma-separated list of loggers to ignore when sending mails.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.logback.mail.level
properties.description: Send mails for log statements of this level or higher.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.logback.mail.to-address
properties.description: The receiver mail address to use for logback mails.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.logback.sentry.enabled
properties.description: Enable sending sentry events via logback.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.logback.sentry.enforce
properties.description: A comma-separated list of loggers to send sentry events for log statements of any level.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.logback.sentry.ignore
properties.description: A comma-separated list of loggers to ignore when sending sentry events.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.logback.sentry.level
properties.description: Send sentry events for log statements of this level or higher.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.logback.slack.channel
properties.description: The Slack channel to post to.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.logback.slack.enabled
properties.description: Enable posting to Slack via logback.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.logback.slack.icon
properties.description: The icon to use for the Slack message (optional).

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.logback.slack.username
properties.description: The username to use for the Slack message. If not set, the hostname will be used instead.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.logback.slack.webhook
properties.description: The Slack incoming webhook URL.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.login.expiry
properties.description: The expiration time for failed login attempts.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.login.expiry-unit
properties.description: The expiration time unit for failed login attempts.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.login.ip-block
properties.description: Max number of failed login attempts before the IP is blocked.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.login.ip-warn
properties.description: Number of failed login attempts per IP to start notifying.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.login.username-block
properties.description: Max number of failed login attempts before the IP is blocked.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.login.username-warn
properties.description: Number of failed login attempts per IP and username to start notifying.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.mail.debug-address
properties.description: An email address used for debugging.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.mail.debug-bcc
properties.description: Send all mails to the debug address as BCC.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.mail.debug-mode
properties.description: Send all mails to the debug address instead of the real receivers.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.mail.debug-personal
properties.description: Personal identifier for debug email address.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.mail.enabled
properties.description: Enable sending mails with the MailService.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.mail.from-address
properties.description: An email address used for sending notifications.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.mail.from-personal
properties.description: Personal identifier for from email address.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.mail.log-body
properties.description: Include the mail body in the log.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.mail.max-retries
properties.description: Maximum number of retries for connection errors.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.mail.retry-delay
properties.description: Time to wait before retrying after a connection error.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.mail.send-delay
properties.description: Time to wait between sending mails.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.profiling.enabled
properties.description: Set to true to enable method tracing.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.profiling.ignore
properties.description: A comma-separated list of target.method names to ignore.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.profiling.mode
properties.description: The display mode. TREE adds line drawings to the call tree, VERBOSE prints to multiple lines.

properties.name: at.rechnerherz.example.profiling.truncate
properties.description: Strings will be truncated to at most this number of characters, unless mode is VERBOSE.
